Header.title: Talent Squad
Header.paragraph: Why Do You Want To Leave Your Current Job?: All the Stats, Facts, and Data You’ll Ever Need to Know

About.paragraph: TalentSquad, headquartered in Bihar, India & Partner company of Infinetworx, Malaysia. We serve as a specialized in IT Staffing. Our core business is providing IT resources to our client. We are a young team of staffing expertise and includes highly-qualified, talented pool of professionals who hail from industries and have evolved themselves with IT Talents within niche space. We believe in working together with our clients to understand their needs and working methods. Our team contributes its best efforts to assemble the best possible combination of skills and experience to meet the client’s needs and deliver high quality solutions. We cater to all the three segments i.e. Senior Level, Mid-Level and Junior/Fresher level recruitment.
Why: Choosing what is best for you.
The things to look for a perfect candidate
What to consider when selecting an O-RPO?
RPO breaking it down for you
